website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy and water-resistant travel backpack that's comfortable to carry, even when packed with heavy loads.
pros: This aesthetically pleasing backpack stands out for its durability
If you're planning an expedition, you'll find plenty of compartments to store the essentials.The water-resistant coating keeps gadgets safe from the elements
There's also space for an optional hydration system
cons: Users report that the top carry handle wears quicker than on other backpacks

customer_reviews.title: So SO Much Room!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this (pink & gray) backpack for about a month and it feels very durable so far. It can hold an insane amount of stuff. I've got a double stack bento box, 2 Double Gulps cups (not even stacked, both are out), a whole MESS of toiletries, folder, iPad, makeup bag, large hairbrush, a few medicine bottles and it all closes up tidily and carries easily, if you can believe it. I didn't even realize how cramped my old backpack was.
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for my college needs, but with a small cosmetic concern
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great bag that fits everything I need for school, but I am concered about how long the coating will hold up. It has a shiny coating that is peeling up in 2 spots and I've only been using it a week. It's just a small cosmetic flaw and the fabric underneath is still intact, but still...
customer_reviews.author: Dez

customer_reviews.title: A nice bag of reasonable size
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice bag of reasonable size for my daily work needs. I am not a student, but I just carry everyday "stuff", including my lunch usually, but could certainly accommodate a number of items, books, magazines, a tablet, or small laptop. This is also a very nice looking bag, and it is more lightweight than my last backpack that just seemed heavy for no particular reason. The bag has more than adequate strap adjustment to be very comfortable, as I am not a thin person. My only hope is that it is a durable as the last bag..but time will certainly tell!! I would recommend giving this product a try.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea M.

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack to have for life!
customer_reviews.text: The back is beautiful, I love the gray/black color scheme I have. Moreover, the back pack itself has many compartments to store your stuff in and can easily fit a couple textbooks. The backpack is perfect for school/light outdoor hiking/ everyday use. The backpacks straps are not so much comfortable as the strapsfeels like the standard Jansport Super pack backpack. The more you store in the backpack the less comfortable it gets so try to keep a light load. However, keep in mind you get your money's worth as all Jansport backpacks have life time warranty on it. So if your backpack breaks after you passed your Amazon return window, Jansport has lifetime warranty on all of their backpacks.
customer_reviews.author: Matt G

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, functional, and comfortable backpack for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: I'm a student and I purchased this because I wanted to transition from being a bag human (one of those people who lugged around 50 pounds of crap everywhere she went) to a more functional human. This bag truly does the job! I would like a little more space in the main compartment, since it's SUCH a small capacity bag, but that's a minor complaint, and forces me to minimalize anyway :) Just a note about functionality and comfort -- backpacks that carry load closer to your body are ergonomically better, and it's very obvious that this was taken into consideration in the design. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Major upgrade
customer_reviews.text: This is my second jansport bag, bought it to replace a 20 year old bag from college. Not work out, I was bored with it, I carry it every day. This bag would work as a carry on, it is a lot firmer suspension than the old bag, so I'm hoping it will be easier to lug around. The fabric is very distinguished. I would choose the limited addition again, it's very pretty. Looks more professional than my college bag. I like the way the bag opens, you can easily see the contents. Will use this bag for every day carry and for day hiking.
customer_reviews.author: K.Sell

customer_reviews.title: bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Hatchet a year ago, never use it. The handle trip on top didn't have quality sewing and broke. I have to sewing and is ugly. I like the backpack, but the quality is not I expecting. I always though Jean Sport has good quality since it is more expensive than other backpack. But.. not my backpack...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: *One thing to note on the opening*
customer_reviews.text: This is a great backpack! Great interior pockets. One thing to note is that the top flap is zippered, not buckled. So when you open the backpack, you have to unzip the top flap down and around which is kind of inconvenience if you need to just quickly grab something out of the back. Also, the opening is smaller than the width of the actual backpack, so fitting thicker items (textbooks, folders, etc.) could be a struggle.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica P

customer_reviews.title: Great School Bag
customer_reviews.text: We use this primarily for my sons school backpack after going through a new one each year. He picked out the color option and has loved it ever since it came. It's not huge on him and has plenty of pockets for him to stash stuff. When we travel it is easy to empty out and pack as an over night or travel bag. The pouches fit his iPad and headphones along with books and some toys he likes. The chest strap gives him a secure fit.
customer_reviews.author: Spyker

customer_reviews.title: Good design for durable everyday bag.
customer_reviews.text: Overall great bag. The opening for the main compartment takes some getting used to, but it works as well as any other bag and has its own advantages. Good design for on-the-go lifestyle. Take the right strap off and swing the backpack under your left arm; now you have access to the side pocket zippers, the front flap compartment, and the nylon loops where you can hang your carabiners. This backpack is water resistant even in heavy rain, but don't stand under a waterfall or jump into a river with it. Personally, a waist strap would make this a better buy, but I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Ender Kalibo

customer_reviews.title: Not very spacious
customer_reviews.text: I love that it distributes the weight more evenly across your shoulders, however- it does not hold as much as you think. If you are thinking of using this for school- it holds a tablet, a notebook, and one or two thin textbooks. The rest of the space is geared towards smaller items like pencil cases, and places for your wallet, phone, and maybe a snack or two.
customer_reviews.author: Talya

customer_reviews.title: A pretty perfect backpack
customer_reviews.text: This backpack rocks. It has so much storage and well-placed pockets/pouches for organizing. The interior padded pouch for a laptop is perfect and there are additional pouches inside to hold pens, post-its, charge cords etc in addition to main storage area for everything else. The straps are comfortable and the bag is very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Carrieann131

customer_reviews.title: Very Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy backpack. The shoulder padding is extremely comfortable, even when the bag is fully loaded up. I really like the compartments on the inside as well. Much larger than it looks, I use it very frequently for school and travel. Only thing that is stopping me from rating five stars is that the outer white material stains quiet easily. Other than that, near perfect bag!
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Castillo

customer_reviews.title: It has lots of space and pockets
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag I use it for every day use,whether I'm going to the beach or work. It has 6 compartments inside, 2 pockets on the blue flap ,one on the outside and one on the inside, one pouch on each side for bottles with an additional pocket on the outside of the bag. All I was looking for was a bag with much space and many pockets and that's what I got .I would say it could be 10 dollars cheaper but the bag has great material. It takes up my entire back when I wear from shoulder to butt , I'm 5'2".
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack, affordable price
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack, it's large but lightweight and is overflowing with different pockets allowing for tons of storage. The somewhat square shape from the folding top makes it a perfect college bag because of how well it fits my books and laptop. The zipper can sometimes be a little finicky because of the corners it has to go around but the folding top can be left unzipped when traveling short distances
customer_reviews.author: Nathan H

customer_reviews.title: Great bag but a bit tall
customer_reviews.text: Had a Jansport in high school which wore out. This bag will be used in college. Replacing my TNF bag because it had too many pockets. It's nice to be able to grab everything at once in class instead of shuffling through three different poxkets to find a pen, notebook, and computer. Seems to have more than enough room for all my books. I like the lighter colored interior lining. Dual bottle holders is always a bonus. Wish it was not as tall though, maybe minus an inch. Then again I am short.
customer_reviews.author: Cupcake

customer_reviews.title: Durable Nice Backpack
customer_reviews.text: This JanSpoet Hatchet backpack is nice and comes in multiple colors. I would recommend this backpack to any one in general whether it’s for outside hiking or school. It had enough space for a laptop and has multiple pockets. It’s sturdy and doesn’t rip or tear apart even within a year.
customer_reviews.author: Jason L

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Looks Great. Some flaws.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, works great. A few complaints: the main pocket is hard to open and close because of the shape and you can't fill the bag because it opens half way down. If you over fill the internal pockets will permanently expand.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy D.

customer_reviews.title: Bag feels great, very comfortable and seems to be very well ...
customer_reviews.text: Bag feels great, very comfortable and seems to be very well built. I have had JanSport bags in the past and have always had good experiences. I have used this bag daily for about a month now and it has been able to carry everything I have needed so far. Lots of great compartments and loops to clip things onto.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Nice backpack
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack! So cute and just the right size. Perfect to decorate with pins. Only thing I didn't like is that the compartments on the inside are a little tight to really pack stuff in them and it's a little annoying. Overall though great backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Best backpack ever!
customer_reviews.text: Backpack is great I originally purchased a red and blue one of site and traveled all around the U.S. and a few other countries and it has always served me well so I bought this color because I wanted it to match with some of my outfits and I love this color and style. There is plenty of room in the backpack to fit a laptop and clothes and a toiletry kit plus the pockets fit all my chargers and the drink pockets are deep they're great for holding other items too.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Zavala

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful hip bag to have
customer_reviews.text: So I myself am a backpack snob. I love backpacks and always have. This bag is perfect for all my needs. I love the look of it, kind of reminds me of a smaller courier bag with two straps. I ride my road bike everywhere so that’s a huge compliment as well as me being a chef bring my coat, knives and other things I may need. I think this is my favorite backpack to date. I’ll have it for a long time before I get another one. I also love this brand and had a classic one for 5 years before upgrading to this one. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DURABLE AND COOL
customer_reviews.text: So far so good with this backpack. I've had it for 2 months and it's holding up like a champ. I carry tons of stuff with me and use my backpack 6/7 days of the week for school and a commuter backpack for work. Super durable and I get tons of compliments on it too from dude and gals (:
customer_reviews.author: 🌜 Mars 🌞

customer_reviews.title: Real nice
customer_reviews.text: Good for school and traveling abroad. This has had a hard spring and the worst is yet to come. Summer through South America should ruin it. If this thing lasts the year, I’ll bronze it!
customer_reviews.author: Mikazuki K.

customer_reviews.title: Very spacious!!
customer_reviews.text: It is excellent. I love it when it comes to traveling on the airplane. the fabric is very easy to maintain, in case it gets dirty. this is a travelers dream. I would highly recommend this backpack for anyone and it comes in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: DE

customer_reviews.title: My first impression of the bag is that it will ...
customer_reviews.text: My first impression of the bag is that it will not hold up to daily use, but it’s too early to tell. There appears to be a reasonable amount of space in the main compartment, but the other pockets are small. I have a feeling that the bottom will wear out fairly quickly since there isn’t any extra protection or padding. I’ve only started using it so I hope to give it a more positive review in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great material
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my school stuff and also go packing items for h kids for the day. My only complaint is your back sweats if wearing and walking in the heat. Also, if big busted and expecting to use the front support strap for the chest, forgetaboutit! Lol. Otherwise, lots of great storage, drink holders on sides.
customer_reviews.author: Keri A Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: It has good space on the inside. The tablet pocket isn't good for a full sized iPad but it says that in the description. The angle of the main pouch is such that the zippers take two hands to unzip. The main complaint is that the bottom of the main compartment has zero padding at all; if you held it up to the light you'd be able to see through it. Not ideal. Aside from that it's been performing admirably and I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Micah Chaney

customer_reviews.title: It’s really great, don’t let the size fool you
customer_reviews.text: It’s really great, don’t let the size fool you. It wasn’t spacious enough for my textbooks, but in the end I decided to keep it’s pretty great. The flap kind of bothered me because of my tight classrooms, but overall great product i haven’t had any flaws
customer_reviews.author: Cinbelle

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Color
customer_reviews.text: Overall it is a good backpack but the color I received is not what is pictured. The pattern looks like it was sewn inside out because it is much darker than the picture and the inside of the backpack looks like the picture. Disappointed. I wanted the color pictured!
customer_reviews.author: Ksimster

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this pack
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this pack, everything about it! Great size, great colors and just the right amount of pockets! If you're someone who wants to be able to very quickly access the main compartment this pack may not be for you as the zipper follows that flip over flap and does take a few extra seconds to zip and unzip but that didn't bother me. It's a great pack!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: Had it ~ 6 mos now. Great design and great functionality. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: JanSport Rocks
customer_reviews.text: This back pack is holding up very well it's cute and durable. My daughter carried a lot of heavy books. No threads are lose and it's been used to the max. Also she loves how many compartments the bag has.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Best backpack I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best backpack I've ever owned. It has a lot of room. The zipper placements are odd and hard to zip but I don't use them much. The cup holders are not elastic so it will be tricky to get in beverages. Overall though, it's exactly what I need.
customer_reviews.author: ArayaLia

customer_reviews.title: Spacious and of great quality. Can easily fit in a computer
customer_reviews.text: Spacious and of great quality. Can easily fit in a computer, a pair of over the ear headphones, a sweatshirt, and a bike helmet/or a lunch bag! The side pocket holds water bottles really well too.
customer_reviews.author: CXW

customer_reviews.title: Sewing quality Skechy
customer_reviews.text: The strap at the top begins to tear after a couple weeks of commuting, Not even using it daily. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Questionable durability.
customer_reviews.text: If i was reviewing this backpack on looks alone i'd give it 5 no question. However, the hand strap at the top of the bag is half torn off after only a few months of normal use.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great design style-wise
customer_reviews.text: Great design style-wise, and it has a good amount of storage, but the handle at the top wasn't sewn in deep enough. The first time i lifted it while filled, one end of the handle frayed and slipped out of where it is attached by the shoulder strap. That handle isn't really essential to the bag, but this was disappointing nonetheless. Great bag otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Good quality & large room.
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty backpack. Quality is good for the price. It’s has individual room for laptop and some paper documents. My cousin loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin

customer_reviews.title: Thought the quality would be better
customer_reviews.text: Overall it is well built and looks and feels cool. However, not even a week into using it, the top handle got de-tached, pretty disapointing, I am still using it though
customer_reviews.author: Minoru Tsuru

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Backpack
customer_reviews.text: The backpack is great and people ask me where I got it all the time. I would highly recommend the backpack to anyone who is looking for one.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew James Beck

customer_reviews.title: Great Size
customer_reviews.text: I use this backpack for school and it is a great size to fit everything I need through the day including notebooks, laptop, lunch, and even a change of clothes. it is very waterproof and even in a downpour it kept all my papers and laptop dry. I would not be thriving in college as well as I am without this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Catheryne

customer_reviews.title: Versatile bag to use for travel and work
customer_reviews.text: Quite a neat bag with many different pockets, works great as a light travel backpack on airplanes and I also use it for work to carry around my laptop. Fits a 15" Macbook with ease. So far its been almost half a year and it is in amazing shape. Hoping it will last for many years as my other Jansport bags of the past.
customer_reviews.author: DANIEL

customer_reviews.title: Great for on the go
customer_reviews.text: Bought backpack for a work trip and to have as a carry on when flying. Worked perfect and fits so much! Love all the extra pockets for miscellaneous items and water bottle pocket.
customer_reviews.author: D.rink

customer_reviews.title: Nice backpack but one major flaw
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and functionality of this backpack. I can easily fit everything I need for my daily commute. But there is one big problem. It doesn’t allow much airflow and I find myself sweating a lot when I wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Openbox

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Backpack has been holding up really good after two years.
customer_reviews.author: Luis P.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my daughters 8 day trip to Europe. She used it as her carry on and when she would go out for exploring. She loved it. Next up... 15 day Mediterranean Cruise. This will be her main suitcase. Travel lightly folks!
customer_reviews.author: Cris Hale

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love the color. we have three children and each own two jansport backpacks.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Kim

customer_reviews.title: Just one small problem
customer_reviews.text: Amazing item it protects my stuff from the rain and is very durable however placing cold drinks on the side is a bad idea since that's the only place the bad dosent have water proofing I found that my camera was wet after the condensation from the water bottle got through the bag
customer_reviews.author: Hugo Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Good backpack, but expensive
customer_reviews.text: For what you pay it should be better made as well as larger in capacity. If this have costed me $38-45 would have been great.
customer_reviews.author: mafiori

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite backpacks!
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack- it's perfect for day hikes. It can hold a lot and sits high on the shoulders so it won't make you sore.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Jansport always makes a quality product and this is no exception. Very roomy.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect multi-use urban backpack
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is PERFECT! I was so happy to find it on Amazon because the color I wanted was not available anymore on the Jansport website. It's not bully and holds just enough!
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for my son and he's very happy and satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son and he's very happy and satisfied. Has many compartments, even for his laptop. Overall very satisfied👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Bertha

customer_reviews.title: Awesome look
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome bag! It has a cool look that my high school son loves compared to the typical bookbag. It fits all of his books well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Lots of room. Inside pockets fit my tablet and laptop. Spots for 2 water bottles or one water bottle and a can of Pringles.
customer_reviews.author: E J

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this pack. I bought it two months ago when I was started as a camp counselor and I am still excited about it. Great quality and a ton of pockets to store stuff. I use this pack daily and it is my go to bag.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn

customer_reviews.title: My everyday companionship
customer_reviews.text: In love with this backpack. Very good quality and array of spaces.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this backpack for a few years now and it’s still holding up great. I’ve used it for school, airplane travel, and for work. I love the opening on it - it’s easier to get things in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Steinbrueck

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy backpack with lots of space
customer_reviews.text: Great size backpack for middle or high schoolers. Lots of pocket space
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Some reviews mentioned that it's too small but I don't need to fill it up. I carry my everyday essentials and it works perfectly for that. I like how many pockets it has and how lightweight the bag is!
customer_reviews.author: RAWR

customer_reviews.title: Cool bag
customer_reviews.text: Looks big but doesn’t fit much for its size. However, it looks cool. I love that it has many pockets inside and outside. Can store small things everywhere depending on how often I need them. Have been using for 2 years now.
customer_reviews.author: Tenzin Lama

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, but the interior netting isn't Jansport-worthy
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag. Easily my favorite backpack, currently. However, the netting/mesh pouch inside the top flap has begun to split in different places, all on it's own. The webbing seems to fray easily. I'm going to explore the replacement policy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: College Essential
customer_reviews.text: At first it seemed small, but there so many compartments that can hold things the stuff has found a spot for its own. Also like how low profile the bag is.
customer_reviews.author: Paul V.

customer_reviews.title: Super practical and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is just a great backpack. I've taken it camping and to an amusement park, and it's so handy and lightweight. It has lots of pockets and lets you store a lot in a more organized fashion than most backpacks.
customer_reviews.author: MM Frost

customer_reviews.title: ... have had the backpack for a week and I love it. The material/zippers do not feel as quality ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had the backpack for a week and I love it. The material/zippers do not feel as quality as a comparable model by L.L. Bean or my previous Dakine backpack. However, the number of pockets and storage compartments are fantastic! I am a graduate student and am required to carry many things each day. This bag is able to fit them all! It is pretty reasonably priced as well!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Parks

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday bag
customer_reviews.text: Too small for a carry on but will work for class
customer_reviews.author: Thatgrlty

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack for college
customer_reviews.text: Love the bucket style of this backpack. Great for carrying my laptop and 1-2 textbooks along with other random small stuff around campus. The water bottle pouches are great as well since they have straps that tighten
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack use it for school.
customer_reviews.text: Good backpack and very durable. Just realized Jan sport has a lifetime warranty too. Great quality color is nice too :-)
customer_reviews.author: ali

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!! Worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as gift for my brother 2 years ago and he uses it everyday and still look great.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Large capacity, easy to use. Comfortable to wear. Lifetime warranty through Jansport. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: R. U.

customer_reviews.title: Cool backpack
customer_reviews.text: Not too big, but very stylish and minimalistic in my opinion. Perfect for carrying my 15" laptop and some books. Quality is great, as expected from a JanSport backpack.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Has alot more space than I anticipated. Fits my laptop, books and other things perfectly. Use it for both work and school. Would recommend as a every day carry bag
customer_reviews.author: pcguy2016

customer_reviews.title: Poorly put together backpack
customer_reviews.text: Small space inside, can barely fit anything. Things keep ripping and I’ve had it for two months and have only been using it three weeks.
customer_reviews.author: ALCM

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and good for travel
customer_reviews.text: Seems like an amazing backpack with duel water bottle pockets. Perfect for travel! No one is getting in this without you noticing. I'm excited to see how well it holds up especially with a lifetime guarantee
customer_reviews.author: Casie peterson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack! item exactly as described. looks even better in person
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Warren

customer_reviews.title: Does what it needs to do
customer_reviews.text: Backpack was just as expected, and carries most of the stuff I put in it.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great College Gift!
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it! Bought this backpack for my son for college, and he totally loves it, he says it's much nicer in person than the pics👍
customer_reviews.author: lizzy nunez

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: I get lots of compliments on this bag! It's so unique :) Lots of good pockets and just what I needed for a good price
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: My 13 year old LOVES this bag! It fits ...
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old LOVES this bag! It fits all the books he needs to carry for 8th grade! Well made...
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Jones

customer_reviews.title: She loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sister. She liked my JanSport Hatchet; and loves hers!
customer_reviews.author: BKLYNAve

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to use for school
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend and he loves it! Very high quality bag. Perfect to use for school. HIghly recommend for guys!
customer_reviews.author: Alayne Santos

customer_reviews.title: Good durability
customer_reviews.text: I like the durability of this backpack. I’m not crazy about the material for the backpack. It’s almost like raincoat material.
customer_reviews.author: REN E.B.

customer_reviews.title: Backpack is nice
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure about buying since it's a little pricey. But it was money well spent. I use this for college and I bring my textbook and notebooks. All the material in the backpack fits comfortably on my back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: Have used this backpack for months as a carry on and hiking. Plenty of storage and compartments. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Bradway

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic bag, very light, and has plenty of zippered pockets for storing things.
customer_reviews.author: Brendyn Hitt

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction
customer_reviews.text: | have been using this for about 2 months and the top handle is already frayed to the point of tearing off.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We have had this backpack since school started. Still looks new and holds a lot of books.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Functional and roomy
customer_reviews.text: I use this backpack as my main bag since I bike to work everyday. I can fit school stuff, a change of clothes, and my lunch. I love that it opens from the top and I love all the pockets. Super functional.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Garner

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag with multiple compartments. Material seems strong and shoulder straps aren't cheap like I've seen some JanSport bags to be, these ones have excellent padding and construction.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: 3 years and more
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is great! I've been using it for school and hiking for over 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Purkiss

customer_reviews.title: Room to spare & Vibrant Colors
customer_reviews.text: Great quality backpack. Fits my 15” MacBook Pro with ease. I can also fit my thick Erin Condren planner, and 2 40oz Hydro flasks with room to spare. The colors are more vibrant than the photo listed but I love it.
customer_reviews.author: C.K

customer_reviews.title: Looks great! Good Quality!
customer_reviews.text: One of a good looking backpack, love the color, good quality,
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and nicely padded!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new backpack! I really like the color scheme, the pockets and the ample space inside. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Jansport Knapsack
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter. She selected it and absolutely loves it. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Tyrell

customer_reviews.title: It's a good backpack
customer_reviews.text: It's good but so many pockets, a little confusing, top pocket is hard to open, but overall love it - it is great quality and very fashionable.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Longstreet

customer_reviews.title: Great One!
customer_reviews.text: It's my first JansSport Backpack And founf it to be a great one! I put a lot inside the bag everything comes in! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Avital

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, just as expected. Jansport never fails! Carries a lot and looks stylish while I walk around campus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack! I love the color and comfort. It is going to last me a long time. The difference pockets are so handy as well
customer_reviews.author: Allison Healy

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack but...
customer_reviews.text: Got this backpack for work. Not even a month in and the top handle has started to rip on one side. Other than that it’s great for, ya know, carryin’ stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Matt W.

product_meta.title: JanSport Hatchet Backpack
feature_bullets: THE HATCHET BACKPACK: Built for city adventures with the look & sturdy construction of the rugged backcountry, the JanSport Hatchet has a 15" padded laptop sleeve, internal organizer panel, tablet pocket, two water bottle pockets, & front zippered pocket.

YOUR EVERYDAY, EVERYWHERE BACKPACK: JanSport backpacks are popular at school for a reason. With colors & style that reflect your personality, room for books, water bottles, laptops & sports gear, your JanSport goes from school to fun as quickly as you do.

JANSPORT BACKPACKS: JanSport backpacks are made with durable fabric, zippers & straps, in colors & designs to reflect your style. We stand by our packs for a lifetime, so carry your JanSport on your adventures, knowing we'll replace or repair any breaks.

WE'RE ABOUT THE JOURNEY: JanSport is about the discovery of fun, freedom & adventure. From your first school backpack & lunch bag to the messenger bag for your first interview, from running errands to chasing dreams, JanSport gear inspires your journey.
WE'RE THE ORIGINAL: JanSport began making backpacks in 1967. From lunch bags to fanny packs to laptop bags, JanSport gear is durable and functional.
